QuestData.Title: A Better Future
QuestData.Description: We must move quickly, $n. I must save as many of my people as I can before the attack begins.$b$bWord has gotten out in the city that there is a safe haven with us and some no longer fear exile.$b$bVenture into the Grand Promenade, champion. Find those willing to join us and let them know it is time they made their escape.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue $1oa Shal'dorei Insurgents in the Grand Promenade.
QuestData.CompletionText: Each shal'dorei rescued is both a potential enemy vanquished and a new hope for our people.
QuestData.RewardText: Our strength grows and our enemies wane. We will win this fight, $n!
